attributes.action: Legislate to make MP's vote with the electorate that they represent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whilst most of us elect MP's to represent us in Parliament, in the hope that they will reflect the views of the majority of their constituency, many of them ignore our wishes and vote along other lines.  All MP's should be required to petition constituencies (electronically or otherwise) and then vote in accordance with constituency requirements by majority vote.
